001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.update.providers;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
004import com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.update.spi.DnsUpdateProvider;
005import com.exoreaction.xorcery.secrets.Secrets;
006import com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.client.providers.DnsClientConfiguration;
007import com.exoreaction.xorcery.net.Sockets;
008import jakarta.inject.Inject;
009import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
010import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
011import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.ContractsProvided;
012import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
013import org.xbill.DNS.Record;
014import org.xbill.DNS.*;
015
016import java.net.InetSocketAddress;
017import java.util.ArrayList;
018import java.util.List;
019import java.util.Optional;
020import java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage;
021
022@Service(name = "dns.dyndns")
023@ContractsProvided(DnsUpdateProvider.class)
024public class DynamicDnsUpdateProvider
025        implements DnsUpdateProvider {
026
027    private final Resolver resolver;
028    private final Logger logger = LogManager.getLogger(getClass());
029    private final DynamicDnsConfiguration dynamicDnsConfiguration;
030    private final DnsClientConfiguration dnsClientConfiguration;
031
032    @Inject
033    public DynamicDnsUpdateProvider(Configuration configuration, Secrets secrets) {
034        dynamicDnsConfiguration = new DynamicDnsConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("dns.dyndns"));
035        dnsClientConfiguration = new DnsClientConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("dns.client"));
036
037        resolver = getResolver();
038
039        dynamicDnsConfiguration.getKey().ifPresent(key ->
040        {
041            Name algo = Name.fromConstantString(key.getAlgorithm());
042            resolver.setTSIGKey(new TSIG(algo, key.getName(), secrets.getSecretString(key.getSecretName())));
043        });
044
045    }
046
047    @Override
048    public CompletionStage<Void> updateDns(String zone, List<Record> dnsUpdates) {
049
050        Name zoneName = Name.fromConstantString(zone + ".");
051
052        Message msg = Message.newUpdate(zoneName);
053
054        for (Record record : dnsUpdates) {
055            msg.addRecord(record, Section.UPDATE);
056        }
057
058        logger.debug("Update:" + msg);
059        return resolver.sendAsync(msg).thenApply(response ->
060        {
061            logger.debug("Response:" + response);
062            return null;
063        });
064    }
065
066    private Resolver getResolver() {
067        Resolver resolver = dnsClientConfiguration.getNameServers()
068                .flatMap(hosts ->
069                {
070                    if (hosts.isEmpty()) {
071                        return Optional.empty();
072                    } else {
073                        List<Resolver> resolvers = new ArrayList<>();
074                        for (String nameserver : hosts) {
075                            SimpleResolver simpleResolver = new SimpleResolver(Sockets.getInetSocketAddress(nameserver, 53));
076                            resolvers.add(simpleResolver);
077                            logger.debug("DNS updates will be sent to:" + nameserver);
078                        }
079                        if (resolvers.size() == 1) {
080                            return Optional.of(resolvers.get(0));
081                        } else {
082                            return Optional.<Resolver>of(new ExtendedResolver(resolvers));
083                        }
084                    }
085                })
086                .orElseGet(() ->
087                {
088                    List<InetSocketAddress> servers = ResolverConfig.getCurrentConfig().servers();
089                    InetSocketAddress defaultNameServer = servers.get(0);
090                    logger.debug("DNS updates will be sent to:" + defaultNameServer.getHostName());
091                    return new SimpleResolver(defaultNameServer);
092                });
093
094        resolver.setTimeout(dnsClientConfiguration.getTimeout());
095        resolver.setTCP(dnsClientConfiguration.getForceTCP());
096
097        return resolver;
098    }
099}
